CustomField.description: true if current user is a TEI advocate - used for criteria in approval process
CustomField.formula: OR( CreatedBy.Profile.Name = 'TEI Advocate', CreatedBy.UserRole.DeveloperName = 'TEI_Contractor_Recruitment_Advocate', CreatedBy.UserRole.DeveloperName = 'TEI_Account_Management_Advocate', CreatedBy.UserRole.DeveloperName = 'TEI_Account_Management_Team_Lead' )
CustomField.label: TEI Submission
